subject-English: There is a consolidated portfolio where all changes can be managed and tracked to the digital platform regardless of the source of the change.
題目-Chinese: 公司是否透過集中的數位管理平台來進行業務管理與追蹤。

subject-English: The digital platform permits business enabled change without the involvement of IT for content and reference data changes.
題目-Chinese: 公司的數位平台具彈性，能由業務單位直接依據需求調整，不需透過IT調整內容或相關資料。

subject-English: All change follows a common methodology with no lighter levels of governance for smaller, less significant changes.
題目-Chinese: 公司內有一致的系統變更管理方法來處理不同層級、規模的變更。

subject-English: It is possible to deploy changes into production quickly at low cost in order to run pilots with subsets of customers.
題目-Chinese: 公司能以快速且低成本的方式調整產品內容，以滿足特定客群。

subject-English: The majority of services are automatically tested as part of the route to live release process.
題目-Chinese: 公司大部份的服務已經過自動化的測試，此為服務上線計畫中的一環。

subject-English: There are ringfenced teams of designers, engineers, testers, project managers etc. for implementing change in digital.
題目-Chinese: 公司有專責的數位團隊協助執行數位變革，包括設計師、工程師、測試人員以及專案經理等。

subject-English: The flow of work into technology delivery teams is regulated and agreed with the business to keep the team sizes relatively constant or within tolerable growth rates.
題目-Chinese: 技術團隊所執行之工作，係依據業務內容調整，使團隊規模能相對穩定的成長。

subject-English: When a project needs new infrastructure, this typically forms the critical path for deployment.
題目-Chinese: 在建置數位專案的過程中，是否導入新的資訊設備是重要的考量。

subject-English: There is a reliable and repeatable process for commissioning changes on downstream systems within the organisation.
題目-Chinese: 公司面對數位應用系統的變化，能夠以可信賴和重複性的流程來應對。

subject-English: There is the ability to scale your delivery model to cope with peaks in demand and use alternative delivery models where appropriate.
題目-Chinese: 公司在面對需求高峰期時，具有擴充產能的能力，並且在適當時機能使用替代執行方案。

subject-English: Cost and time estimates are reliable and they typically improve as the project proceeds through the development lifecycle.
題目-Chinese: 公司可以準確估計成本和時間，且通常會隨著專案的進行益加改善。

subject-English: There are regular reviews of the technology delivery lifecycle to understand problems and implement improvements to the processes.
題目-Chinese: 公司能定期進行審視專案是位於數位發展的哪個階段，以瞭解問題並進行改善。

subject-English: Project reporting provides leading indicators of milestones that are going to be missed and result in few surprises with regard to slipped project dates.
題目-Chinese: 在數位專案報告中，在定期指標外另設有預警指標，以便在延宕發生時能及早因應。

subject-English: The Head of Digital can draw the high level architecture of digital services.
題目-Chinese: 數位部門的高階主管，具有規劃數位服務架構的能力。

subject-English: The service received from IT represents value for money.
題目-Chinese: IT部門所提供的數位服務，其價值高於投入成本。

subject-English: In a typical project meeting, an outsider would be able to establish who in the project team fulfils a business role and who fulfils a technology role.
題目-Chinese: 在數位專案會議中，可以清楚的分辨出業務端與資訊端之專責人員。

subject-English: The process for delivering new components that require both business and technology input are well understood and mature.
題目-Chinese: 公司內部已建立業務端與資訊端共同執行新業務之合作模式。

subject-English: Ideas for new or improved business propositions have originated from within the technology function.
題目-Chinese: 公司從資訊科技中擷取到發展新業務的創新想法及建議。

subject-English: Technology stakeholders are involved in the early stage development of business propositions, helping to shape propositions into deliverable projects.
題目-Chinese: 資訊相關人員參與數位策略初期的議題討論，並且幫助企業將重要的議題轉換成實際可執行的專案。

subject-English: Business and technology teams are co-located.
題目-Chinese: 業務和資訊團隊在同一個工作環境下合作。

subject-English: Does a typical technology resource working on Digital project understand the broad business strategy of the Digital business and how their project contributes to this?
題目-Chinese: 在數位專案當中，資訊團隊是否充分了解公司於數位業務推動的經營策略，以及了解其團隊可貢獻之處。

subject-English: There is a documented strategy for how mobile services are to be built/deployed with regard to which platforms, native, hybrid, web etc.
題目-Chinese: 公司已發展行動加值服務，包含：相關平台、軟硬體等資源。

subject-English: The mobile strategy is regularly reviewed in the context of customer usage, market trends etc.
題目-Chinese: 公司定期檢視數位行動策略，確認是否符合市場趨勢與消費者的使用習慣。

subject-English: Executives understand the mobile platform choices that have been made and the speed of change within the mobile ecosystem.
題目-Chinese: 高階主管已掌握行動平台建置方案，並了解到行動化趨勢變遷。

subject-English: There is a documented test strategy for mobile and the test coverage aligns with the risk appetite of the business.
題目-Chinese: 公司針對數位化已進行風險胃納量測試。

subject-English: The use of cloud services has been considered and a position with regard to which services will or will not utilise the cloud have been documented.
題目-Chinese: 公司對於運用雲端服務，以及哪類服務將使用雲端服務，都有進行考慮及決策。

subject-English: For internally hosted services, there is a high degree of infrastructure automation.
題目-Chinese: 公司內部服務系統已高度自動化處理。

subject-English: For internally hosted services, there is consistency with regard to hardware/operating system and a clear future strategy.
題目-Chinese: 針對公司內部服務系統，硬體/作業系統和未來策略具有一致性。

subject-English: The server-side technology platform strategy is regularly reviewed to ensure the decisions do not become outdated.
題目-Chinese: 公司定期審視伺服器端科技平台的策略建置方向，以確保相關決策不會過於陳舊。

subject-English: It is possible to add additional capacity to the existing infrastructure within a 3 month lead time.
題目-Chinese: 公司如欲擴充現有的數位設備，可在預期期限內完成相關工作。

subject-English: There is a capacity planning function with clear accountability for ensuring there is sufficient capacity to run the digital services at the predicted volumes.
題目-Chinese: 公司有專職單位負責預計數位服務的業務目標。

subject-English: There is a capacity forecast for business volumes in 12 months time.
題目-Chinese: 公司能針對未來一年的業務量進行預測

subject-English: All the potential sources of analytical data regarding customers and their usage of digital services are understood.
題目-Chinese: 公司了解特定客群目標及其使用數位服務的習慣。

subject-English: There is a common platform where all of the analytical data sets can be combined to develop rich customer insights.
題目-Chinese: 公司具有整合所有的分析資料以建立消費者完整的圖像和使用習性的平台。

subject-English: The data from your web analytics provider is available to be combined with internal analytical sources.
題目-Chinese: 公司於外部網頁的資料能與內部分析工具進行連結。

subject-English: The data within each potential data sources share common customer identifiers to allow data from different sources to be combined.
題目-Chinese: 每個顧客資料平台的具有相同的格式，以便企業將不同來源的資料或數據進行整併。

subject-English: Software changes can be deployed to production without any downtime or degradation of service to customers.
題目-Chinese: 公司得直接進行系統修改，不會對消費者數位服務的使用狀況造成影響。

subject-English: Services are available 24/7 and 365 days a year for your customers to use.
題目-Chinese: 公司全年提供數位服務供消費者隨時享用。

subject-English: In the event of a failure in a downstream system, digital services degrade gracefully keeping as much of the service up as possible.
題目-Chinese: 當數位應用系統發生故障的情況時，數位服務能降低其可能造成的影響及傷害。

subject-English: At peak transaction volumes, in a disaster recovery scenario and with component failure in the active data centre, "hot spots" and when the system is likely to break are understood.
題目-Chinese: 當數據中心於交易高峰期發生故障情形時，公司對於危機應變方案以及系統可能損害的情形具有充分的了解。

subject-English: There has been a severity 1 incidents in the last 12 months when your services have experienced complete downtime for over than hour.
題目-Chinese: 過去12個月中曾發生至少一件危機事件，使得公司的數位系統故障超過一小時的時間。

subject-English: A Disaster Recovery test has been executed in the last 3 months.
題目-Chinese: 在過去3個月內，公司有進行危機補救測試。

subject-English: Real user transactions for availability and response times versus a realistic service level (< 1 second in most cases)are monitored and this is data available in real-time.
題目-Chinese: 公司針對使用者購買時機的便利性和回應時間與當下服務品質進行及時的監控。

subject-English: User response times and other metrics describing the user experience is captured and tracked over time for trends in customer or software behaviour.
題目-Chinese: 使用者的回應時間與消費者體驗能被定期追蹤，以檢視是否符合消費者使用軟體的習慣和市場趨勢。

subject-English: There is a representative Non Functional Test and/or Operational Testing environment in which complex production issues can be resolved.
題目-Chinese: 公司模擬營運情形進行測試，以解決未來發生的複雜問題。

subject-English: Feedback from your production service (functional and non-functional defects, even low priority ones) is systematically and pro-actively fed back to development teams in order to improve the capability of the system.
題目-Chinese: 公司建立一回饋系統，能將服務流程中產生的錯誤（包括各層級、各部門）主動地提供給開發團隊，以提高系統的效能。

subject-English: Support teams have operability levers they can apply in production to change the behaviour of the system, e.g. switches to disable functionality.
題目-Chinese: 數位資訊團隊具有直接改變流程中系統設定的權限，如：關閉特定功能。

subject-English: Priority and budget is allocated to technology teams to optimise poor performance and resolve functional issues in production.
題目-Chinese: 企業對於數位資訊團隊給予高度重視和預算分配，以優化其績效並解決其所面對的問題。
